column5: The Drug Development Science course is a highly flexible study programme designed for those working in or seeking to work in the field of drug development. The course aims to provide students with expertise and skills in all aspects of medicine development, including preclinical testing, clinical development, drug regulation and drug safety.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: MSc full-time: one year, MSc part-time: two-six years
